beginner.title: Beginner Speaking
beginner.description: Basic pronunciation and simple conversation practice

lessons.title: Self Introduction
lessons.instructions: Introduce yourself by saying your name, age, and where you are from. Speak clearly and slowly.
prompts: What do you like to do in your free time?

lessons.title: Daily Activities
lessons.instructions: Describe your daily routine. Use simple present tense and time expressions.
prompts: What time do you wake up?
What do you have for breakfast?
How do you go to work or school?
What do you do in the evening?

lessons.title: Describing Experiences
lessons.instructions: Talk about a memorable experience you had. Use past tense and descriptive language.
prompts: Describe a memorable vacation you took.
Tell me about a challenge you overcame.
What was the best day of your life?
Describe a time when you learned something new.

advanced.title: Advanced Speaking
advanced.description: Complex discussions and presentations on various topics

lessons.title: Opinion and Argumentation
lessons.instructions: Present your opinion on a complex topic with supporting arguments and examples.
prompts: What are the advantages and disadvantages of social media?
How do you think technology will change education in the future?
What is your opinion on remote work vs. office work?
Discuss the impact of globalization on local cultures.
